title-part.text: MACHINES OR EQUIPMENT FOR MAKING OR PROCESSING DOUGHS
HANDLING BAKED ARTICLES MADE FROM DOUGH

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Mixing or kneading machines for the preparation of dough

reference.text: domestic mixing or kneading machines A47J43/00, A47J44/00

CPC-specific-text.text: ; mixing in general B01F; mixing or kneading of substances in a plastic state in general B29B7/00
Plant; Systems, i.e. flow charts or diagrams
Methods

title-part.text: with vertically-mounted tools
Machines for whipping or beating
with inclined rotating mixing arms or levers
with horizontally-mounted mixing or kneading tools
Worm

CPC-specific-text.text: or screw

title-part.text: mixers

CPC-specific-text.text: Worm or screw mixers, e.g. with consecutive mixing receptacles

title-part.text: with rollers

CPC-specific-text.text: by calendering, i.e. working between rollers

reference.text: using rollers for shaping dough A21C3/02

CPC-specific-text.text: having a receptacle rotating about a vertical axis cooperating with rotary rollers

title-part.text: with additional aerating apparatus for the manufacture of aerated doughs

CPC-specific-text.text: the gas being introduced through the shaft of a rotary tool

title-part.text: for the preparation of dough directly from grain
Structural elements of mixing or kneading machines;

CPC-specific-text.text: Parts; Accessories
Tools
having mixing or cutting elements essentially perpendicular to their axes
Shafts; Heads therefor
Feeding mechanisms, e.g. skip lifting mechanisms
for feeding in measured doses
using pneumatic means
for liquids
Discharge mechanisms
using tiltable receptacles; Tilting mechanisms therefor
Controlling; Testing; Measuring
Measuring data of the driving system, e.g. torque, speed, power
Measuring properties of the dough, e.g. moisture, electrical conductivity, temperature
Drives
for planetary motion
Brakes therefor
Safety arrangements
Doors; Closures; Operating, e.g. safety, mechanisms therefor
Receptacles, e.g. provided with means for carrying or guiding fluids, e.g. coolants
Arrangements for cooling or heating

reference.text: receptacles with means for guiding fluids per se A21C1/149

CPC-specific-text.text: ; Arrangements for applying super- or sub-atmospheric pressure

title-part.text: Machines or apparatus for shaping batches of dough before subdivision
Dough-sheeters
Rolling-machines
Rolling-pins

reference.text: mixing or kneading dough by rollers A21C1/08; non-manual rolling and working of discrete dough pieces A21C7/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Rolling-pins; Hand-operated spreading or rolling devices
Laminating or undulating a continuous dough sheet, e.g. by folding transversely or longitudinally onto a moving surface
using one or more rollers with an axis of rotation substantially parallel or oblique to the direction of dough transport
with one or more rollers moving perpendicularly to its rotation axis, e.g. reciprocally

reference.text: A21C3/024 takes precedence; hand-operated rollers A21C3/021

CPC-specific-text.text: with multiple rollers moving in a closed loop, e.g. in an orbital path; Planetary roller systems
using rollers having a shape other than straight round cylinders

title-part.text: Dough-extruding machines

CPC-specific-text.text: ; Hoppers with moving elements, e.g. rollers or belts as wall elements for drawing the dough

title-part.text: Machines for coiling sheets of dough, e.g. for producing rolls

CPC-specific-text.text: , e.g. crescent-rolls

reference.text: as part of a machine for further moulding or forming A21C7/00; with filling A21C9/06

CPC-specific-text.text: the coil axis of the produced rolls being in parallel or oblique position relative to the transport direction; with coiling elements, e.g. rollers, being placed in parallel or oblique position relative to the transport direction

title-part.text: Machines for twisting strips of dough, e.g. for making pretzels
combined with dough-dividing apparatus
Dough-dividing machines

CPC-specific-text.text: with revolving bodies, e.g. with bodies having spaces separated by radially oriented elements or walls
for dispensing liquid or semi-liquid dough, e.g. batter

title-part.text: with division boxes and ejection plungers
with division boxes in a revolving body with radially-working pistons
with division boxes in a revolving body with axially-working pistons
with radial, i.e. star-like, cutter-blades slidable in the slots of, and relatively to, a pressing-plunger
Machines which homogenise the subdivided dough by working other than by kneading

CPC-specific-text.text: the dough pieces being worked in radially disposed cavities in a rotating drum

title-part.text: with endless bands
with moulding channels
with moulding cups
combined with dividing machines with radial, i.e. star-like, cutter-blades slidable in the slots of, and relatively to, a pressing-plunger
Other apparatus for handling dough or dough pieces
Apparatus for hanging or distributing strings of dough, such as noodles, spaghetti or macaroni, on bars
Apparatus for spreading granular material on, or sweeping or coating the surfaces of, pieces or sheets of dough

CPC-specific-text.text: Laminating dough sheets combined with applying a filling in between, e.g. lasagna-type products

reference.text: ravioli-making machines A21C9/066; making laminated baked wafer sheets A21C15/02

title-part.text: Apparatus for filling pieces of dough such as doughnuts

reference.text: A21C11/163 takes precedence; apparatus for filling baked articles A21C15/007

CPC-specific-text.text: Making continuous filled tubular products, e.g. with subsequent cutting
Applying a folding, wrapping, rolling action
by means of injection into a piece of dough
using two separate sheets or pieces of dough with filling in between, e.g. crimped at their edges; Ravioli-making machines
Tools for crimping or trimming of edges or rims, e.g. hand-operated

title-part.text: Depositing, arranging and conveying apparatus for handling pieces, e.g. sheets of dough

reference.text: for handling liquid or semi-liquid dough, e.g. batter A21C5/006

CPC-specific-text.text: Charging of baking tins or forms with dough
Manipulating tins, pans etc., e.g. charging or discharging conveyors, trolleys or ovens
Separating, spacing, orienting or aligning discrete dough pieces, e.g. after passing a cutting device
Stacking or unstacking discrete dough sheets

reference.text: with filling in between sheets A21C9/045

CPC-specific-text.text: Folding or bending discrete dough pieces or dough strips

reference.text: twisting strips of dough A21C3/08; with filling action A21C9/063; forming toroid-shaped dough pieces A21C11/002

title-part.text: Other machines for forming the dough into its final shape before cooking or baking

CPC-specific-text.text: the shape being toroid-like, e.g. bagels, doughnuts

reference.text: extruding machines for toroid shaped products A21C11/166

CPC-specific-text.text: forming the dough into a substantially disc-like shape with or without an outer rim, e.g. for making pie crusts, cake shells or pizza bases
by pressing or press-moulding
by press-rolling

title-part.text: Embossing machines
with cutting and embossing rollers or drums
handling regularly pre-shaped sheets of dough
with engraved moulds, e.g. rotary machines with die rolls
combined with cutting apparatus

CPC-specific-text.text: having multiple cutting elements slidably or rotably mounted in a diaphragm-like arrangement
using hand-operated cutting tools

title-part.text: Apparatus for slotting, slitting or perforating the surface of pieces of dough
for star-like stamping
Extruding machines

CPC-specific-text.text: Applying co-extrusion, i.e. extruding two or more plastic substances simultaneously, e.g. for making filled dough products; Making products from two or more different substances supplied to the extruder
for making toroid-shaped products, e.g. doughnuts

title-part.text: with pistons
with worms
Apparatus with rollers and cutting discs or blades for shaping noodles
Apparatus for cutting out noodles from a sheet or ribbon of dough by an engaging pair of grooved rollers
Provers, i.e. apparatus permitting dough to rise
with endless conveyors

CPC-specific-text.text: , e.g. for moving the dough pieces progressively through the prover

title-part.text: Machines or equipment for making or processing dough, not provided for in other groups of this subclass
Apparatus for handling baked articles

CPC-specific-text.text: Apparatus for spreading granular material on, or sweeping or coating the surface of baked articles

reference.text: of pieces of dough A21C9/04; for confectionary A23G3/28

CPC-specific-text.text: of which at least the dispensing part is hand-held, e.g. comprising a flexible container, pouch or gun-like applicator
Apparatus for filling baked articles

reference.text: filling pieces of dough A21C9/06; filled bakery products A21D13/30, A21D13/80

title-part.text: Apparatus for shaping or moulding baked wafers
Making multi-layer wafer sheets

CPC-specific-text.text: Apparatus for shaping or moulding baked wafers, e.g. to obtain cones for ice cream

title-part.text: Cutting or slicing machines or devices specially adapted for baked articles other than bread

reference.text: for cutting or slicing bread B26B, B26D
